# Lingering Arcana
## Overview
**Lingering Arcana**

You can put the force magic you invoke to multiple uses.

**Benefit:** When you cast a \[force] spell of 1st level or higher, as a swift action you may also gain the benefits of *[[Mage Armor (Spell)|mage armor]]* or *[[Shield (Spell)|shield]]* (your choice) for 1 round.

**Source:** Ultimate Options: New Arcane Discoveries (Super Genius Games), pg. 5
